guide.step_1_description:
Each queue collects respective information such as HPI, RoS. Patients are attached to you,
however specialists not – it means that if you don’t pick a call on time someone other might answer it.
guide.step_2_description:
We gather all crucial information needed to be provided before a visit start.
All these are located in one place to be shown in a convenient way.
guide.step_3_description:
DrOnline allows you to connect with your patients using your computer’s camera. Make sure it works and has an access
to be connected with your browser which is used to utilize DrOnline.
guide.step_4_description:
Video calls are consisted of Timeline on which take place all actions that can be done by you towards treatment. Patient
Info gathers all information from patient’s profile. Medical Summary is mandatory when a call ends.
guide.step_5_description:
Take a high level outline on your calendar – move between month and week views.
Check how many free slots and visits you have scheduled.
guide.step_6_description:
Statuses of your visits: “Scheduled” means a patient is awaiting for being examined by a nurse. “Prepared” means green
light, so the patient has been examined and all needed info such as HPI, RoS and The Talest Vitals have been collected.
guide.step_7_description:
Easily add and invite your patients to utilize DrOnline as well as manage your patient datatbase.
The core of the product where all crucial information are collected.
guide.step_8_description:
DrOnline creates patient profile which is constantly populating. Basic Info and Health Info are mandatory while adding a
new patient or while patient is creating account by himself.
guide.step_9_description:
Health Info is consiste of The Latest Vitals, HPI, RoSa and patient’s histories such as: Social, Past Medical, Surgial,
Family, Allergy & Immunization. All those information are constantly updated to keep you looped in.
guide.step_10_description:
Every your patient has a catalogue of records. Each records is consisted of: a timeline (a transcript of video calls which
took place during the treatment), record overview, HPI, RoS and medical summaries of specialists who had an input.
guide.step_11_title: Supervise your membership levels and payments
guide.step_11_description:
Change your membership level at any time. At the beginning your start with Basic level consisted of the most primary
features allowing you to utilize DrOnline in a convenient way.
guide.step_12_title: Supervise your membership levels and payments
guide.step_12_description:
If you are interested in spreading your range of acessibilty to patient get familiar with other plans. Each plan is billed
monthly according to your local law taxes.
guide.finished_description: Whenever you decide to take the walk-through one more time, you can easily find it in the side menu.
guide.close_tooltip: If you change your mind, you can launch the demo from the menu.
